metadata.title: shop4ever Life is Better at The Lake Women's V-Neck T-Shirt Sayings Shirts Slim FIT
features: ORIGINAL DESIGN. Official Shop4Ever brand. We create unique, thoughtful designs for everyday casual wear, special occasions, and holidays. Proudly designed and printed in the United States.

QUALITY FIT. Comfortable, lightweight, SLIM fitted tee, recommended to order a size up. Solid colors are 100% cotton material, heather colors are 65/35 cotton poly blend, sports grey is 90/10 cotton poly blend. Machine wash inside out with cold water, tumble dry low. Design print may appear smaller on larger sizes.

GREAT FOR PEOPLE WHO LOVE THE LAKE. Treat yourself with a Lake Mode top because Life is Better at the Lake! Perfect for spring and summer vacations or just that weekend getaway with friends or family! Great for nature lovers or outdoorsman! Lovers of sports, hunting, fishing, camping or hiking.

PERFECT GIFT IDEA! Thoughtful gift for your teacher, coworker, friend, boyfriend, girlfriend, mom, dad, grandma, grandpa, brother, sister, son, or daughter. Great gift for Birthdays, Anniversaries, Valentine's Day, Christmas, Mother's Day, Father's Day, graduation, Teacher Appreciation Day, or any special occasion.

MORE CHOICES FOR YOU. Visit our Shop4Ever store for our a wide selection of novelty apparel for mom, dad, wife husband, boyfriend, girlfriend, grandpa, grandma, sister, brother, daughter, son and yourself. We also have more novelty gifts available, like coffee mugs, wine glasses, tote bags and aprons.
description: Exclusive Shop4Ever brand novelty shirts made with a cotton blend. These shirts are printed exclusively in the United States. Recommended to wash in cold water, inside out. This is a slim fitted shirt, we recommend to order a size larger when in between sizes. Many of our designs are available in hoodies, crewnecks, men’s, women’s, and youth sizes and come in a variety of different colors. Check our store to see them all!
